statements: DELETE FROM humanitarian_supplies WHERE quantity < 10 AND location = 'Warehouse A';
DELETE FROM humanitarian_supplies WHERE supplier_name = 'Global Aid' AND delivery_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM humanitarian_supplies WHERE item_name = 'Tents' AND (location = 'Field Hospital' OR location = 'Relief Camp');
DELETE FROM inventory WHERE quantity <= 5 AND location = 'Warehouse A';
DELETE FROM procurement WHERE vendor = 'Supplier X' AND delivery_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Supplies WHERE id = 1 AND location = 'Warehouse A';
DELETE FROM Orders WHERE quantity_ordered > 100 AND order_date < '2023-01-01';
DELETE FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_id IN (SELECT supplier_id FROM Suppliers WHERE contact_person = 'John Doe');
DELETE FROM products WHERE id IN (SELECT id FROM products WHERE price < 100);
DELETE FROM suppliers WHERE id NOT IN (SELECT supplier_id FROM transactions);
